alert.note: Alert for Smyth; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 30 at 4:20AM EDT until March 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON EDT TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR STRONG GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, AND DRY FUELS FOR TAZEWELL AND SMYTH COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA... The National Weather Service in Blacksburg has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong gusty winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels. The Watch is in effect from noon EDT today through this evening. * Affected Area...In Virginia, Fire Weather Zone 007 Tazewell and Fire Weather Zone 009 Smyth. * Winds...South 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 30 percent. * Impacts...Wildfires will be difficult to contain and control during these types of weather conditions. Outdoor burning of any kind is strongly discouraged.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
